Directions: In a mixing bowl, beat cream cheese until smooth. In another mixing bowl, combine cream, sugar and vanilla; beat until soft peaks form. Beat into the cream cheese until blended. Fold in cranberry sauce. Spoon into crust. Cover and freeze for up to 2 months. Remove from the freezer 15 minutes before slicing.
Ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) can whole berry cranberry sauce
